dogsim
Class DogManager

java.lang.Object
  dogsim.DogManager

public class DogManager
extends java.lang.Object

Main class responsible for setting up an Arena, and adding dogs. dogs are introduced and removed from the interaction space in a pseudorandomn fashion while the program is running. A maximum of MAX_DOGS can be present at any given time.

Author:
Karel Bergmann
See Also:
Arena, Dog

removeDog

private void removeDog()
Removes a dog from the arena

See Also:
Arena, Dog

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method. Loops infinitely. On each iteration sleeps SLEEP_INTERVAL milliseconds, introduces a dog with probability DOG_INTRO and removes a dog with probability DOG_REMOVE. Supports upto MAX_DOGS at any one time.

Parameters:
args - not used
